main.name: Jelena Zobenica
main.description: I program banking and insurance applications (CRM for banks, net banking). Currently I am upgrading my React skills
main.bio: I would like to be a part of an open-minded environment which is ready for changes, which inspires and sets examples to others. As someone who prefers quality over quantity, I have constantly been taking small steps in order to search for a better version of myself and thus contribute to my surroundings. Should you consider that we are led by the same compass and if you feel that I would be suitable for your business policy, I would gladly accept your invitation.

education.school: Faculty of Economics in Subotica, Department in Novi Sad
education.degree: Master's Degree, European and International Economics and Business

education.school: Faculty of Economics in Subotica, Department in Novi Sad
education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, European and International Economics and Business

work.title: Software engineer
work.description: Working on CRM for banking software applying technologies Java, Spring Boot, Angular 8, PrimeNG, HTML5, CSS3.

work.title: Backend Internship
work.description: Implementing multimodular Maven project with Spring (Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA and Hibernate, Spring Security) and MySql database, covering code by JUnit and Mockito tests

work.title: Junior Software Engineer
work.description: Front-End web development on Clockify project (https://clockify.me/) using HTML, CSS, Sass, Compass, Angular 4 and JavaScript

projects.title: CRM for bank
projects.description: Tracking and showing sales flow through different chart diagrams, finding solutions for UI design and making different kinds of reports, uploading and downloading documents, validating forms using Reactive forms.
projects.tags: Angular 8, PrimeNG 8, Spring Boot, HTML5, CSS3

projects.title: Clockify
projects.description: Improve front-end user interface, displaying data of projects, tags, clients, crud operations, comunication between different pages.

projects.title: Olympus
projects.description: Focus on this project was to create page layout similar to social networks in Angular 7. I tried to use CSS grid, Flex layout techniques and responsive design. Implement basic routing from login-page to profile-page and make reusable components in Angular.
projects.tags: Angular 7, Sass, CSS grid and Flex layout, HTML5

projects.title: Weather Forecast
projects.description: This application is about a weather forecast search engine, by city. User has ability to search multiple cities and sees the current weather conditions.

testimonials.text: Efficient self-learner comes to my mind when I think about Jelena. Being one of reviewers of her internship work and collaborating on Clockify project, I had the pleasure of working with her for six months. Thing we have in common is that we both started programming from scratch. Having that in mind, I really admire the way she handled all work-related challenges. As she encountered new technologies such as HTML, CSS, SASS, Compass and AngularJS, she proved to be quick-learner by gaining hands-on experience. The biggest rivalry we had at the table football where she shook my confidence from time to time. On the other hand, her persistency and devotion to the game, she demonstrated in the work too. As highly motivated teammate, Jelena would be an asset to any organization..

Jelena is a highly motivated and devoted person, who is ready to be constantly improving and gaining new knowledge and skills. By having a professional approach and the greatest determination, she proved that such a trust was given to her with a reason
